content.name: systemCapacity
content.description: Capacity data for all pools collected for the storage system.

attributes.name: compressionPercent
attributes.description: Compression enabled increase of storage space expressed as percentage of summary of used and compression saved space size. This attribute is obsolete and will be removed in a future release. Please use systemCapacity.dataReductionPercent instead.

attributes.name: sizeUsed
attributes.description: Amount of used space in the pools on the storage system.

attributes.name: compressionRatio
attributes.description: Storage efficiency ratio of compressed data on the system, calculated according to the Compression savings  for each block and file object (LUN/ Filesystem/ Data Store) and its Snapshots, thus demonstrating the efficiency of Compression. This also includes the pattern detection savings. This attribute is obsolete and will be removed in a future release. Please use systemCapacity.dataReductionRatio instead.

attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the systemCapacity instance.

attributes.name: sizeFree
attributes.description: Amount of free space available in the pools on the storage system.

attributes.name: sizeSubscribed
attributes.description: Size of space requested by the storage resources allocated in all pools for possible future allocations. If this value is greater than the total size, it means pools are oversubscribed.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the systemCapacity instance.

attributes.name: sizeTotal
attributes.description: Total amount of space (used space plus free space) in the pools on the storage system.

attributes.name: tiers
attributes.description: Size information (total, free, used) per tier.

attributes.name: compressionSizeSaved
attributes.description: Amount of space saved by compression in the pools on the storage system. This attribute is obsolete and will be removed in a future release. Please use systemCapacity.dataReductionSizeSaved instead.

attributes.name: dataReductionSizeSaved
attributes.description: Amount of space saved by data reduction (includes savings from compression and deduplication) in the pools   on the storage system.

attributes.name: dataReductionRatio
attributes.description: Storage efficiency ratio of applying data reduction on the system, calculated according to the data reduction savings  (includes savings from compression and deduplication) for each block and file object (LUN/Filesystem/datastore) and  its snapshots, thus demonstrating the efficiency of data reduction.

attributes.name: dataReductionPercent
attributes.description: Data reduction applied increase of storage space expressed as percentage of summary of used and data reduction   saved space size (includes space saved from compression and deduplication).
